com.gocardless.services

Class CreditorService.CreditorUpdateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.http.PutRequest<Creditor>
      • com.gocardless.services.CreditorService.CreditorUpdateRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    CreditorService

    public static final class CreditorService.CreditorUpdateRequest
extends PutRequest<Creditor>

    Request class for CreditorService.update(java.lang.String).

    Updates a creditor object. Supports all of the fields supported when creating a creditor.
